meanings.definition: A device that converts a liquid into a fine spray.
meanings.sent1: The atomiser sprayed a mist of water onto the plants.
meanings.sent2: She used the atomiser to spray perfume on her wrists.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the atomiser, creating a mini rainstorm.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an atomiser, spreading rumors throughout the school.
meanings.sent5: The atomiser hummed softly as it released the refreshing mist.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that atomises.
meanings.sent1: The scientist was an expert atomiser, breaking down substances into tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: The machine acted as an atomiser, dispersing the liquid evenly.
meanings.sent3: The little boy pretended to be an atomiser, spraying imaginary magic all around.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter worked like an atomiser, spreading joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The atomiser of ideas, he transformed complex theories into simple explanations.
